**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 33 **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 33 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 [Grave Karina](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1699) **Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 31 **Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), smoke vision **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20); (can't speak any language) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +22, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +24 **Str** +4 **Dex** +7 **Con** +4 **Int** -1 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +7 **Smoke Vision** Smoke doesn't impair a grave karina's vision; they ignore the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from smoke, including the ash they create with their Breath Weapon.
**Sound Imitation** A grave karina who succeeds at a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47) can mimic any voice they have heard. They have a +4 circumstance bonus to this check. --- **AC** 30 **Fort** +21 **Ref** +24 **Will** +19 **HP** 240 **Weaknesses** [good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83) 10 --- **Speed** 10 feet, fly 50 feet **Melee** beak +24 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d10+16 piercing plus grave blight **Melee** claw +22 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d8+13 slashing plus grave blight **Melee** talon +24 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d6+13 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Breath Weapon** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The grave karina breathes a cloud of burning ash in 30-foot cone that deals 9d8 fire damage (DC 30 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The area becomes filled with ash for 1 round. All creatures within the cloud of ash become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), and all creatures outside the cloud become concealed to creatures within it. The grave karina can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. **Grave Blight** ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** DC 27 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 2d6 poison damage, and [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (1 day); **Stage 3** 2d8 poison damage, every hour the victim must succeed at another Fortitude save or be [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) for 1 minute, and sickened 2 (1 day) **Mocking Cry** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16)) The grave karina mimics a voice and mocks a creature within 30 feet. They attempt a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) the creature. Regardless of whether the check succeeds, the target is temporarily immune to the grave karina's mocking cry for 1 hour. **Shadow Command** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** The grave karina is adjacent to a creature that's casting a shadow; **Effect** The grave karina drives a talon into a creature's shadow and attempts to manipulate it like a puppet with the effects of [_dominate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=87) (DC 27 Will save), except the duration is only 1 minute.
name: Grave Karina
